1: @@//pa gang yin <error-prone>dang //thig</error-prone> le <error-prone>u</error-prone> yig dang ldan pa'i//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa 'gyur te//rta mchog rgyal po chen po yis//thams cad dus su <error-prone>bzla</error-prone> bar <error-prone>bya//las</error-prone> rnams
2: thams cad 'grub pa ni//'joms pa las grub dran las dga'//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//o yig thig le dang ldan par//de bzhin dbus
3: las dbu ma <error-prone>pa//sgra yig</error-prone> i dang <error-prone>sbyor</error-prone> bar bya//dbang ldan phyi rol de bzhin te//dbus las dbu ma dang ldan bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin <error-prone>te//me</error-prone> mtshams pa yi stan <error-prone>ldan</error-prone> <error-prone>pa'i//lho</error-prone>
4: las dbu ma yang yin te//byang las bzhi pa gang yin <error-prone>dang //me</error-prone> mtshams pa <error-prone>yi</error-prone> mnyam gnon <error-prone>pa'i//dbus</error-prone> las <error-prone>tha ma</error-prone> 'gyur ldan <error-prone>bya//lho</error-prone> las dbu ma yang yin <error-prone>te//tsheg</error-prone> drag <error-prone>i yig</error-prone>
5: <error-prone>ldan</error-prone> pa ni//sna tshogs <error-prone>pad+mo</error-prone> zhes su grags//zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so//o yig <error-prone>thig</error-prone> le dang ldan <error-prone>par//i yig</error-prone> dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i//
6: <error-prone>dbus</error-prone> las dbu ma yang yin te//dbang ldan phyi rol pa bzung nas//dbus <error-prone>las</error-prone> dbu ma ldan par bya//dbus las dbu ma de bzhin te//me mtshams pa yi stan ldan pa'i//lho las dbu ma
7: 'gyur bar <error-prone>bya//bden</error-prone> <error-prone>bral</error-prone> phyi rol bzung ba <error-prone>dang //dbus</error-prone> las dbu ma ldan pa <error-prone>yi//byang</error-prone> las dang po 'gyur bar bya//tsheg drag dang ni mnyam ldan pa'i//rlung mtshams phyi rol pa yang yin//
8: <error-prone>rta</error-prone> yi rgyal <error-prone>po'i</error-prone> dkyil 'khor <error-prone>la//sna</error-prone> tshogs rdo rje zhes grags so//gang dang gang gi dbus la ni//rta mchog 'di ni <error-prone>gzhag</error-prone> bya na//de nyid <error-prone>de yi</error-prone> <error-prone>dkyil</error-prone> 'khor yin//yul <error-prone>'khor</error-prone> thams cad 'dul
